<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// erase&#95;one - Erase one element from the queue, regardless of its</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// position. This operation performs a linear search to find an element</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// equal to t, but then uses all logarithmic-time algorithms to do</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the erase operation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a89ce59a53dfd16d3194518d0c209ff97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a89ce59a53dfd16d3194518d0c209ff97">erase&#95;one</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;t) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Linear-search to find the element.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sequence::size&#95;type i = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(this-&gt;c, t) - this-&gt;c.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Logarithmic-time heap bubble-up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (i != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sequence::size&#95;type parent = (i - 1) / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">      this-&gt;c&#91;i&#93; = this-&gt;c&#91;parent&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">      i = parent;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The element we want to remove is now at the root, so we can use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// priority&#95;queue&#39;s plain pop to remove it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">    this-&gt;pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reheapify - If an element in the queue has changed in a way that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// affects its standing in the comparison function, the queue&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// internal state becomes invalid. Calling reheapify() resets the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// queue&#39;s state, making it valid again. This operation has time</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// complexity proportional to the number of elements in the queue,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// so don&#39;t plan to use it a lot.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a79d40f085693726bbebb3a1d67303c01"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a79d40f085693726bbebb3a1d67303c01">reheapify</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::make&#95;heap(this-&gt;c.begin(), this-&gt;c.end(), this-&gt;comp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// clear - Erase all elements from the queue.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a583627bbdd690ca5df5ed7b00a5f7b18"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a583627bbdd690ca5df5ed7b00a5f7b18">clear</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    this-&gt;c.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
